double_agent_1.completePlayerMessage: You saved my life, thank you! Now go to Jaeger, he has a job for you.

double_agent_1.description: Listen, guy! We have a war here between Scavs and Traders. Lately, Scavs have been attacking our camp more often. Please help us! We need a lot more medicine and information. And please do not cooperate with the Fence and Skier, they are working with the Scavs!
double_agent_1.name: Double Agent - Part 1
double_agent_1.startedMessageText: Listen young man, We have a war here between Scavs and the Traders. Lately, Scavs have been attacking our camp more often. Please help us! We need a lot more medicine and information. And please do not cooperate with the Fence and Skier , they are working with the scav!
double_agent_1.successMessageText: You saved my life, thank you! Now go to the Jaeger, he has a job for you.

double_agent_2.completePlayerMessage: Good job, now we can rest a little and feel safe. You did a great job for us. Prapor will contact you shortly with more information.

double_agent_5_1.description: Hey, you're the guy who helped us resupply our camp last time. You may have heard that we got attacked last night. We want fucking revenge, but we're still licking our wounds. We can Should we hire you to track down those scav assholes who were here last night? We saw them running back to customs with their leader. Fuck them all - we'll pay!

double_agent_19_jaeger.successMessageText: Oh my gosh, thank you! Now I can watch at least one or two seasons of my favorite series.

double_agent_20.completePlayerMessage: Now you've seen our base. Keep it a secret!

AvailableForFinish.id: Find the hidden entrance to the secret base inside the underground bunker

double_agent_20.description: You've earned our trust many times over. Now it's time to introduce you to our secret base. Go down to the underground bunker on the Reserve at these coordinates [Hands out a crumpled piece of paper with the inscription 'Safe Corridor'], and we'll talk. The question remains to be clarified. Who's our rat?
double_agent_20.name: Double Agent - Part 20
double_agent_20.startedMessageText: You've earned our trust many times over. Now it's time to introduce you to our secret base. Go down to the underground bunker on the Reserve at these coordinates, and we'll talk. The only question left is who our rat is.
double_agent_20.successMessageText: Now you've seen our base. Keep it a secret!

double_agent_final_1.completePlayerMessage: You did it. You repelled the attack of the Scavs, found out who the rat was, and killed him. You are our hero!

AvailableForFinish.id: Disguise yourself by wearing a Shattered or Glorious E mask and a "Trooper TFO" Body Armor, kill Scavs on Reserve.
Go to the office of one of the Scav leaders in the laboratory and fabricate information about a possible rat
Give me a modified version of the flash drive to make the Orderly look like a rat
Kill the Orderly and clear your name

double_agent_final_1.description: [Narrator: 'Knowing where the secret base is, you sit back and think about how to stay disguised while both sides suspect there is a 'rat' in their ranks. After a while, an idea occurs to you the idea is to start a battle by revealing the location of a secret base to the Scavs, and then take the side of one of the factions in order to become their savior. Still, someone needs to be put in the role of a 'rat' so that you are not in sight, but for this. you have already prepared a plan....'] Peacemaker: You have earned our trust many times. Now it's time to introduce you to our secret base. Go down to the underground bunker on Reserve, and we will talk about who the rat is.
double_agent_final_1.name: Double Agent - Final - Merchants
double_agent_final_1.startedMessageText: [Narrator: 'Knowing where the secret base is, you sit on your ass and think about how to stay on both sides while both sides suspect that there is a 'rat' in their ranks. After a while, you the idea comes to mind to start a battle by revealing the location of the Scavs’ secret base, and then take the side of one of the factions in order to become their savior. Still, someone needs to be put in the role of a 'rat' so that you are not in sight, but. and for this you have already prepared a plan....'] Peacemaker: You have repeatedly earned our trust. Now it’s time to introduce you to our secret base. Go down to the underground bunker on Reserva, and we’ll talk about who the rat is.'
double_agent_final_1.successMessageText: You did it. You repelled the attack of the Scavs, found out who the rat was, and killed him. You are our hero!

double_agent_final_2.completePlayerMessage: HAHAHA, we showed the merchants who's boss here. And that damned traitor Orderly is no more either. You are a true comrade and truly one of us!

AvailableForFinish.id: Disguise yourself by wearing any hockey player mask and scav vest and destroy PMCs on Reserve
Clear the way to the underground bunker so the Gopniks can plant a bomb.
Go to the office of one of the Scav leaders in the laboratory and fabricate information about a possible rat
Give me a modified version of the flash drive to make the Orderly look like a rat
Kill the Orderly and clear your name

double_agent_final_2.description: [Narrator: “Knowing where the secret base is, you sit on your ass and think about how to stay on both sides while both sides suspect that there is a “rat” in their ranks. After a while, you the idea comes to mind to start a battle by revealing the location of the Scavs’ secret base, and then take the side of one of the factions in order to become their savior. Still, someone needs to be cast as a “rat” in order to divert suspicion from oneself, but also for. you have already prepared a plan...'] Skier: Hey, comrade, thanks for the information about the secret base. We were preparing an attack plan, but the rat told the merchants that we were coming. We need to act quickly now!
double_agent_final_2.name: Double Agent - Finale - Savages
double_agent_final_2.startedMessageText: [Narrator: 'Knowing where the secret base is, you sit on your ass and think about how to stay on both sides while both sides suspect that there is a 'rat' in their ranks. After a while, you the idea comes to mind to start a battle by revealing the location of the Scavs’ secret base, and then take the side of one of the factions in order to become their savior. Still, someone needs to be cast as a “rat” in order to divert suspicion from oneself, but also for. You've already prepared a plan...'] Skier: Hey, comrade, thanks for the information about the secret base. We were preparing an attack plan, but the rat told the merchants that we were coming. We need to act quickly now!
double_agent_final_2.successMessageText: HAHAHA, we showed the merchants who's boss here. And that damned traitor Orderly is no more either. You are a true comrade and truly one of us!

double_agent_redemption_1.completePlayerMessage: It's not the best solution, but at least we can live for now and tolerate the superiority of the merchants.

AvailableForFinish.id: Give back the gold Roler Submariner watch found in the raid
Hand over the metal fuel cans found in the raid
Hand over the silver tokens found in the raid
Hunt down and fuck all the PMCs that escaped from the merchant base during the final battle.

double_agent_redemption_1.description: Where were you when we attacked the secret base? You didn't show up at the most crucial moment just to chase the rat? The secret base was so protected that we had no way to destroy it. I have to kill you on place. But I'm giving you one last chance to redeem yourself, since you found out who the rat was.
double_agent_redemption_1.name: Double Agent - Redemption
double_agent_redemption_1.startedMessageText: Where were you when we attacked the secret base? You didn't show up at the most crucial moment just to chase the rat? The secret base was so protected that we had no way to destroy it. I have to kill you on place. But I'm giving you one last chance to redeem yourself, since you found out who the rat was.
double_agent_redemption_1.successMessageText: It's not the best solution, but at least we can live for now and tolerate the superiority of the merchants.

double_agent_redemption_2.completePlayerMessage: You seem to regret your decision, but you still have a long way to go...to cleanse yourself of this crap...

AvailableForFinish.id: Give back the hand drills you found to the raid
Give back the military battery 6-STEN-140-M found in the raid
Give back the FP-100 absorber filter found in the raid
Hunt down and indiscriminately kill all the Scavs that roam Tarkov.

double_agent_redemption_2.description: You decided to go after the rat when we were attacked. Now our secret base is destroyed, and we will have to fear constant attacks from the Scavs. In my opinion, we should ban a degenerate like you, but the merchants want to give you one last chance redeem yourself because you eliminated the rat that brought us to this situation. Complete the tasks we require of you and your reputation can be restored over time.
double_agent_redemption_2.name: Double Agent - Redemption
double_agent_redemption_2.startedMessageText: You decided to go after the rat when we were attacked. Now our secret base is destroyed and we will have to fear constant attacks from the Scavs. In my opinion, we should ban a degenerate like you, but the traders want to give you one last chance redeem yourself because you eliminated the rat that brought us to this situation. Complete the tasks we require of you and your reputation can be restored over time.
double_agent_redemption_2.successMessageText: You seem to regret your decision, but you still have a long way to go...to cleanse yourself of this crap...
